name: Mutape!
description:
Clear the room and enter the door to go to the next, but beware, the years of experimentation have taken their toll on your body, there's no telling what the side effects might be! Can you fight your way through the lab, the tower and Sorcerian's crystal abode to defeat him once and for all?

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys: Movement
  • Q/Z/O: Attack
  • E/X/P: Dash
  • Space: Start game/Skip opening cutscene
  • Esc: Return to main menu
  • Select mutation: Click the icon - no keyboard support for this yet, sorry!

Built and submitted for Bevy Jam 3.

NOTES: 

  • 4 mutations are missing effects, sorry.
  • Only works properly at 1080p, so if your screen is only 1080p you might want to play in fullscreen or scale your browser view (ctrl+mousewheel down/up, or ctrl+(+/-))

Credits:

  • Rolypoly - Artwork
  • sazzlepops- Artwork, music, sfx
  • 0xD21f - Programming, minor artwork
